OnCommandMsgs.msg: Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch server mode. [GREEN]!mode prac[NORMAL] works as well. Type [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] for the current mode map list. [GREEN]!map de_inferno[NORMAL] works as well.  To enter [GREEN]prefire practice[NORMAL] mode, please type [RED]!prefire[NORMAL] while on prefire mode. Some modes have a [GREEN]!help[NORMAL] chat command for a list of commands.

Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch server mode. [GREEN]!mode prac[NORMAL] works as well. Type [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] for the current mode map list. [GREEN]!map de_inferno[NORMAL] works as well.  To enter [GREEN]prefire practice[NORMAL] mode, please type [RED]!prefire[NORMAL] while on prefire mode. Some modes have a [GREEN]!help[NORMAL] chat command for a list of commands.

OnPlayerConnectMsgs.msg: [GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Multi 1v1 Arenas  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Aim_ Maps  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Movement - BHop  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.  Type [RED]!help[NORMAL] to access the mode help menu.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Gun Game  [NORMAL]Use [GREEN]!music[NORMAL] to disable sounds [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.

[GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Hide and Seek  [NORMAL]Press [GREEN]E[NORMAL] in front of you to freeze/unfreeze [NORMAL]Press [GREEN]E[NORMAL] under you to whistle [NORMAL]Props change randomly at [GREEN]4:00 | 2:00 | 1:00[NORMAL] (you cannot choose) [NORMAL]Use [GREEN]thirdperson[NORMAL] in console to see yourself [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.
